about_the_game:
Slav Junkie Simulator as name says is a simulator which is simulation of life as a drug addict in a soviet city.
You live in a small soviet slav eastern european cyberpunk city. You have severe heroin addiction that you need to sustain. You start in debt to the local mafia. Heroin is very expensive and earnings in a rural city are very small, barely enough for survival. You live with your grandpa who has small pension. Survive one week.

Game features:
  • Simulator - simulation of real life of some people, which struggle with drug addiction
  • Survival game - survive for one week
  • Animated characters with slav dubbing and english subtitles
  • Start with debt to local mafia and lend more money from them
  • Need to take heroin or you will get cold turkey, or even die
  • Buy legal drug, cheap alternative from local pharmacy
  • Explore slav eastern european soviet cyberpunk city
  • Random events in city
  • Talk with your grandpa and other people in city
  • Mini game brew your own homemade drug
  • LSD trip and usage of other drugs
  • Drug dealer sometimes sell shady krokodil

Locations and events that revolve around your drug use, bad and good
  • Start in small soviet city with small community, local thugs and pharmacy
  • Harvesting poppies from poppy field farm
  • Being rescued in ambulance and hospital after overdose
  • Interrogation about drug dealer at police station
  • Rave Party
  • Court Trial
  • Prison

content_descriptors.notes: There is frequent depiction of drug use, and addiction. There is mild violence, like bandit attacking you, but nothing gore. There is depiction of drama around drug use, so overdoses, suicide, health problems etc. There is depiction of crime like court trial or interrogation by police. Legal drugs are shown in pharmacy.

detailed_description:
Steam Exclusive Offer

Slav Junkie Simulator as name says is a simulator which is simulation of life as a drug addict in a soviet city.
You live in a small soviet slav eastern european cyberpunk city. You have severe heroin addiction that you need to sustain. You start in debt to the local mafia. Heroin is very expensive and earnings in a rural city are very small, barely enough for survival. You live with your grandpa who has small pension. Survive one week.
